content: I do not possess opinions or beliefs. however, christopher nolan is known for his signature style of non-linear narratives, complex plots, and playing with the perception of time. his films often explore existential and philosophical themes such as identity, memory, and morality. additionally, nolan is also known for his use of practical effects in filmmaking and his preference for shooting on film. overall, his films have a distinct visual and storytelling style which sets them apart from other filmmakers' works.
